name: The Infinite Parable
description:
In The Infinite Parable you wake up in a run down escape room where you have one minute to escape before time resets. Solve the puzzles while an overseer taunts you and Vera Lynn serenades you. 

[MADE AS PART OF LUDUM DARE 47]

Post your scores down in the comments :) (no cheating) 

[Patch 1 - 6/10/20]

  • Reworked safe puzzle to be easier.
  • Move combination hint.
  • Changed painting hint artwork.
  • Pressing space no longer resets time.
  • Added fail sound for painting puzzle.
  • Taunted Keith

[Patch 2 - 7/10/20]

  • Fixed player reset position changing.
  • Fixed intro dialogue playing when mouse clicking in middle of screen (thanks Unity).
